FuncDef: This command specifies the route target to be added to the advertised routes or compared against the received routes from other VRFs on the same or remote PE routers. vrf-import or vrf-export policies override the vrf-target policy.
CLIs: vrf-target { unicast | <ext-community> | export unicast | <ext-community> | import unicast | <ext-community> }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to use unicast vrf-target ext-community for the multicast VPN.
An extended BGP community in the type:x:y format. The value x can be an integer or IP address. The type can be the target or origin. x and y are 16-bit integers.
Specifies communities allowed to be accepted from remote PE neighbors.
Specifies communities allowed to be sent to remote PE neighbors.
